history.proof: intros H. apply supM. intros y Hy. sauto q: on depth: 3use: sub_supP.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: lattice
s: Pred T
C: sup_closed s
u: Pred tp
x: Poset.sort tp

Goal:
(forall y : tp, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup u <== x

Premises:
Notation Poset T m := (Poset.pack id)
sub_sup = fun u : Pred tp => exist (Mem s) (sub_sup' u) (sub_supX u) : Pred tp -> tp
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
Pred = fun T : Type => T -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Pred _%type_scope
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
Notation tp := (subPoset s)
sup_closed = fun T : lattice => [Pred s | forall d : Pred_Class, d <=p s -> sup d \In s] : forall T : lattice, Simpl_Pred (Pred T) Arguments sup_closed {T}
sub_supP : forall (u : Pred tp) (x : tp), x \In u -> x <== sub_sup u
sub_sup' = fun u : Pred tp => sup [Pred x | exists y : tp, y \In u /\ x = sval y] : Pred tp -> T
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp x : tp |- Type] ?T' : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp x : tp |- Type] ?f : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp x : tp |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp x : tp |- ?T'] ?s : [T : lattice s : Pred T C : sup_closed s u : Pred tp x : tp |- seq ?T]
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
sub_supX : forall u : Pred tp, sub_sup' u \In s
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0
PosetMixin : forall (T : Type) (mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop), (forall x : T, mx_leq x x) -> (forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y) -> (forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z) -> Poset.mixin_of T
sub_asym : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y x -> x = y
InE : forall T : Type, (forall x y : T, x \In [:: y] <-> x = y) * (forall (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s <-> x = y \/ x \In s) * (forall (T0 : Type) (x : T0) (p : Simpl_Pred T0), (x \In p) = p x)
sub_trans : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y z : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y z -> sub_leq x z
dfun_asym : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset) (x : forall x : A, B x) (y : forall x0 : A, B x0), dfun_leq x y -> dfun_leq y x -> x = y
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
fun_asym : forall (A : Type) (B : poset) (x y : A -> B), fun_leq x y -> fun_leq y x -> x = y
ideal_asym : forall (T : poset) (P : T) (x y : ideal P), ideal_leq x y -> ideal_leq y x -> x = y
pair_asym : forall (A B : poset) (x y : A * B), pair_leq x y -> pair_leq y x -> x = y
relaxP : forall (T : poset) (P1 P2 : T), P1 <== P2 -> forall p : T, p <== P1 -> p <== P2
sup_closure = fun (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) => [Pred p | forall t : Pred T, s <=p t -> t \In sup_closed -> p \In t] : forall T : lattice, Pred T -> Simpl_Pred T Arguments sup_closure {T}
dfun_trans : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset) (x : forall x : A, B x) (y z : forall x0 : A, B x0), dfun_leq x y -> dfun_leq y z -> dfun_leq x z
fun_trans : forall (A : Type) (B : poset) (x y z : A -> B), fun_leq x y -> fun_leq y z -> fun_leq x z
dfun_leq : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset), (forall x : A, B x) -> (forall x : A, B x) -> Prop
ideal_trans : forall (T : poset) (P : T) (x y z : ideal P), ideal_leq x y -> ideal_leq y z -> ideal_leq x z
Pred_of_Simpl_morph : forall (T : Type) (x y : Simpl_Pred T), EqSimplPred x y -> x <~> y
pair_trans : forall (A B : poset) (x y z : A * B), pair_leq x y -> pair_leq y z -> pair_leq x z
Record mixin_of (T : Type) : Type := Mixin { mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop; _ : forall x : T, mx_leq x x; _ : forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y; _ : forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z } Arguments Poset.mixin_of _%type_scope Arguments Poset.Mixin [T]%type_scope [mx_leq]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
predC_morph : forall (T : Type) (x y : Pred_Class), x <~> y -> PredC x <~> PredC y

```coq
intros H.
apply supM.
intros y Hy.
rewrite <- (sub_supP _ _ Hy).
apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros H. apply supM. intros y Hy. rewrite <- (sub_supP _ _ Hy). apply H.
